identity.name: E1
identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.

headings.usage: All section titles, hero text, and major calls to action. Use italic variant for emphasis words.

body.usage: Paragraphs, navigation, buttons, and form inputs.

primary.description: Deep Teal - Extracted from salon accent wall. Use for primary buttons, active states, and key brand elements.

secondary.description: Warm Taupe - Extracted from salon chairs. Use for borders, subheadings, and secondary accents.

background.description: Creamy Off-White - Lightened version of salon flooring. Main page background.

surface.description: Pure White - For cards and modal backgrounds.

text.description: Dark Slate - High contrast for readability.

textures.noise: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 200 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cfilter id='noiseFilter'%3E%3CfeTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.65' numOctaves='3' stitchTiles='stitch'/%3E%3C/filter%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' filter='url(%23noiseFilter)' opacity='0.05'/%3E%3C/svg%3E")

buttons.primary: bg-[#1C5D70] text-white hover:bg-[#154a59] rounded-full px-8 py-4 text-sm uppercase tracking-widest transition-all duration-300 hover:scale-105
buttons.secondary: border border-[#1C5D70] text-[#1C5D70] hover:bg-[#1C5D70] hover:text-white rounded-full px-8 py-4 text-sm uppercase tracking-widest transition-all duration-300
buttons.floating_whatsapp: fixed bottom-8 right-8 z-50 bg-[#25D366] text-white p-4 rounded-full shadow-lg hover:scale-110 transition-transform duration-300

cards.service: group relative overflow-hidden bg-white border border-[#A48A6C]/20 p-8 hover:border-[#1C5D70] transition-colors duration-300
cards.testimonial: bg-[#F2EFE9] p-10 italic font-serif text-xl text-[#1C5D70]

inputs.default: bg-transparent border-b border-[#A48A6C]/40 focus:border-[#1C5D70] outline-none py-4 text-lg w-full placeholder:text-[#A48A6C]/60 rounded-none

hero.structure: Full viewport height (h-screen). Background image is the salon interior. Gradient overlay from bottom. Text aligned bottom-left. Large serif heading.

services.structure: Grid layout with varying cell sizes. Some cells are images, some are text descriptions. Use 'Tetris' mode from E1 guidelines.

gallery.structure: Staggered columns. Images load with a fade-in and slight upward motion.

setup: Install fonts: Playfair Display and Manrope from Google Fonts.
Configure Tailwind: Update tailwind.config.js with the custom color palette (Teal/Taupe/Cream).
Install Lenis: 'npm install @studio-freight/lenis' for smooth scrolling.
implementation_order: 1. Configure Global Styles (Fonts, Colors, Lenis Scroll).
2. Build Hero Section (Use the provided salon interior image).
5. Build Admin Dashboard (Layout with Sidebar, Data Tables).
critical_rules: DO NOT use standard Shadcn cards for the public site. Use the custom 'service' card style defined in components.
Ensure the 'Book Appointment' CTA is always visible (Sticky Header or Floating Button).
Use the extracted Teal (#1C5D70) for all primary actions.
Admin panel should be cleaner/denser than the public site. Use standard Shadcn components there.

anti_slop: Use noise texture overlays to reduce digital flatness.
Ensure all interactive elements have hover states.
accessibility: Ensure text contrast on the Teal background is WCAG AA compliant (White text works).
All images must have alt text.
